#summary This wiki describe the Taxonomy dataset on the Desktop Tool

= Taxonomy = 

The figure shows [SearchTab Search Tab] using the Taxonomy as main dataset. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/4.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *!TaxId* and *Synonym* (human, H.sapiens, Homo%) fields including the use of simple regular expressions too. There is no possibility to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains] on the *Taxonomy* search tab due to the *Taxonomy* module is the basement of the relational schema and it is used to organize the rest of the inserted data. The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, with the result taxonomies.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/5.jpg

The taxonomy complete description window

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/6.jpg
